result.title: Initial Scientific Report on the theoretical capabilities of ideal HSF
result.description: This deliverable will model and evaluate via computer simulations the communication structure of a HSF and its performance, assuming a single communicating node pair and focusing on the realistic modelling of node hardware (based on NoC capabilities), the communication channel at THz adapted for the HSF case, the modulation and encoding schemes.

result.title: Final report on software revisions
result.description: The HSF software (middleware & compiler software) may require revisions during the iterations between HSF design and prototyping. This deliverable will report the revisions performed on the HSF software, from its initial version (M24, D.2.5) until the end of the project, in order to keep it on par with the final prototype.

result.title: Report on the efficiency of the HSF controller networking mechanism
result.description: This report details the attained capabilities (and potential issues) pertaining to the networking protocol handling the communication among the HSF control nodes. The deliverable will use the same performance metrics defined in the corresponding theoretical design phase at D2.5.
